description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Green Bean Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn & Green Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil spray

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange lettuce, beans, prawns and croutons on plates. Drizzle over dressing and crumble over ricotta. Season with pepper. Serve.
